I for one am not interested in getting into a religious war or a religious based government (or military). From the article - """"A few of the names on the letter have courted controversy in the past. Lt. Gen. William G. Boykin described the fight against Islamic terrorism as a battle between a """"Christian nation"""" and Islam. In describing the hunt for a terrorist leader in Somalia, Boykin described his god as being """"bigger than his,"""" adding that """"my god was a real god and his god was an idol.""""
But who has motive? Who cares about this guy?

Sleep deprivation will seriously mess with your mind. I went years with a sleep disorder and eventually went to a neurologist because I thought was having signs of dementia or something because my memory was horrible. After testing and MRI to rule out other possibilities she suggested I get my stress and sleep problems under control.After trying several things that had bad side effects and left me feeling like a zombie someone suggested essential oils. Bingo! It didn't happen overnight but over the next couple months of trying different combinations my sleep cycle corrected itself. It had made a world of difference in my mind functioning. I don't think people realize how much long term sleep issues can impact your brain. Sorry about the long story but thought it's something really important to think about.

No matter how you plan to vote, this should bother you immensely. That the Russians would SO want Trump president, that they'd pull a stunt like this. If they can get into the DNC, they can certainly get into the RNC and if you think there weren't incriminating emails over there, well, I've got some ocean front property in AZ you may be interested in. A foreign country should have no part in deciding an American election.
